name: ZZWebTouchControl
summary: 仿微信，长按web二维码图片，识别出二维码内容.
description:
两种webView(UIWebView与WKWebView)的长按图片动作控制类，仿微信长按web二维码图片，解析出二维码内容. 
 Two kinds of webView (UIWebView and WKWebView) long-press picture action control class, mimic the length of Wechat according to the web two-dimensional code picture, and parse the two-dimensional code content.
